title: 77 - Faith In The White House - Guest Michael Wear
description:
In this episode we talk with Michael Wear, former Obama White House Staffer and Author of the book "Reclaiming Hope: Lessons Learned in the Obama White House about the Future of Faith in America". Michael is also a Christian, a Democrat, and is full of articulation about how we should approach politics as followers of Jesus and how much of a role they should play in the identity of our daily lives.

Learn more about Michael Wear at www.michaelwear.com
Buy Michael's book, Reclaiming Hope: https://www.amazon.com/Reclaiming-Hope-Lessons-Learned-America/dp/071808232X?ie=UT&ref_=sr_1_1&s=books

- Mike Erre

Learn more about the VOX Podcast:
www.voxpodcast.com
